created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
name: Indirect Command Execution
description: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant (pcalua.exe or forfiles.exe).
false_positives: Need to use extra processing with 'unique_count' / 'filter' to focus on outliers as opposed to commonly seen artifacts.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.parent.executable:(*\\pcalua.exe OR *\\forfiles.exe)`
